items.content:
This Update includes numerous new features and content! 
            New Robberies & Heists!
            New Illegal Activities/Items/Locations
            Reworked 5 Drugs!
            New Gang Activities!
            New Civ Jobs! Rework of Old Civ Jobs!
            Item Decay Added 
            QOL updatees for PD/EMS/DOJ!
            Please see our Discord server for more information.

We have been putting out regular updates during 3.0 but we have also been working on a Massive Push of Updates
            All together we feel this brings Viper into 3.5! 

            Please see our Discord server for more information.
